title:u/pandapaxxy's Season of the Chosen Nightfall Ordeal, Ritual, Season Pass Breakdown, Controller
description:Originally found at https://www.reddit.com/r/sharditkeepit/comments/lnw5dn/nightfall_ordeal_ritual_season_pass_breakdown/

// The Palindrome
//notes:pandapaxxy (PvE / Controller): "Overflow is easily one of my favorite perks in all of Destiny 2. Simply walk over special or heavy ammo and not only is your gun reloaded but its mag is doubled? Heck yes. Pair that with the new(ish) one for all perk that gives you better damage from clearing adds? A match made in heaven. If you want more direct damage increases then rampage is your go-to. Never have to reload as long as you can pick up ammo." Recommended MW: Reload.|tags:pve,controller
dimwishlist:item=432476743&perks=1840239774,1087426260,3643424744,4049631843

// The Palindrome
//notes:pandapaxxy (PvP / Controller): "You can nearly ignore handling if you roll quickdraw. Throw on targeting mods to make the ADS feel even better. While you can make any of the fourth column perks work in PvP I feel rangefinder is the only one that remotely sways PvP. You won’t really find any benefit from rangefinder in PvE, whereas any of the other perks can work in PvE but not entirely in PvP." Recommended MW: Range.|tags:pvp,controller

// The Palindrome (Adept)
//notes:pandapaxxy (PvE / Controller): "Overflow is easily one of my favorite perks in all of Destiny 2. Simply walk over special or heavy ammo and not only is your gun reloaded but its mag is doubled? Heck yes. Pair that with the new(ish) one for all perk that gives you better damage from clearing adds? A match made in heaven. If you want more direct damage increases then rampage is your go-to. Never have to reload as long as you can pick up ammo." Recommended MW: Reload.|tags:pve,controller
dimwishlist:item=1481892490&perks=1840239774,1087426260,3643424744,4049631843

// The Palindrome (Adept)
//notes:pandapaxxy (PvP / Controller): "You can nearly ignore handling if you roll quickdraw. Throw on targeting mods to make the ADS feel even better. While you can make any of the fourth column perks work in PvP I feel rangefinder is the only one that remotely sways PvP. You won’t really find any benefit from rangefinder in PvE, whereas any of the other perks can work in PvE but not entirely in PvP." Recommended MW: Range.|tags:pvp,controller

// Shadow Price
//notes:pandapaxxy (PvE / Controller): "For PvE I’ll always recommend overflow whenever it’s possible. Overflow just makes playing any PvE content that much easier because one of your weapons is always reloaded and oftentimes has double capacity. [...] One for all can make spreading the damage a lot easier and I find it to be one of the top perks for PvE. If you want something a bit “faster” than opting for swashbuckler will provide that." Recommended MW: Reload.|tags:pve,controller
dimwishlist:item=2633186522&perks=1840239774,106909392,3643424744,4049631843

// Shadow Price (Adept)
//notes:pandapaxxy (PvE / Controller): "For PvE I’ll always recommend overflow whenever it’s possible. Overflow just makes playing any PvE content that much easier because one of your weapons is always reloaded and oftentimes has double capacity. [...] One for all can make spreading the damage a lot easier and I find it to be one of the top perks for PvE. If you want something a bit “faster” than opting for swashbuckler will provide that." Recommended MW: Reload.|tags:pve,controller

// Salvager's Salvo
//notes:pandapaxxy (PvE / Controller): "The perks and overall utility aren’t bad and it gives New Light’s and players with bad RNG (me) access to an A tier grenade launcher. For PvE I really like the combination of ambitious assassin for double grenades and chain reaction for more boom. But you really can’t go wrong with either of them." Recommended MW: Handling.|tags:pve,controller
dimwishlist:item=2060863616&perks=3525010810,3301904089,2010801679,2396489472
dimwishlist:item=2060863616&perks=3525010810,3301904089,3523296417,2396489472

dimwishlist:item=2060863616&perks=3525010810,3301904089,3523296417,1546637391


// Salvager's Salvo
//notes:pandapaxxy (PvP / Controller): "For PvP the only useful perk is demolitionist. There’s a niche for ambitious assassin and it certainly throws me off whenever I go up against it, but that is few and far between. Vorpal is arguably the better of the two perks but either could work. Punish people who touch cheeks or have more damage against Behemoths I mean supers." Recommended MW: Handling.|tags:pvp,controller
dimwishlist:item=2060863616&perks=3525010810,3301904089,3523296417,1546637391

//notes:pandapaxxy (PvP / Controller): "For PvP you’re gonna want to drop the charge time as low as possible. Make it as close to a heavy sniper rifle as you can. Actually, better yet, just use a heavy exotic sniper like Whisper of the Worm. You still styled on other guardians by killing them, AND you’re showing them that you’re using your exotic slot on a heavy weapon." Recommended MW: Charge Time.|tags:pvp,controller
